title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements through stakeholder interviews and market research.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the virtual reality platform, backend services, data storage, and integration with third-party services (e.g., payment gateways, real estate data providers). This design should consider scalability, security, and performance to ensure a seamless user experience. Additionally, the design should incorporate modularity to facilitate future updates and expansions.

title: Virtual Reality User Interface Design
description: Design the user interface and user experience for the virtual reality platform.

title: Backend Services Development
description: Develop the backend services for property data management, investment tracking, and integration with external APIs.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing property data, user information, and investment records.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the platform adheres to security best practices and complies with relevant regulations for real estate investment.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and implement a comprehensive testing strategy for the virtual reality platform and backend services.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the infrastructure and automation for deploying and managing the virtual reality platform and backend services.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for users, developers, and administrators, and establish user support channels.
